title: Lux skin idea
body:
I really think there should be a Popstar Lux skin (like Ahri). Most of you might think "but she just got Star Gaurdian Lux", well it's been like a year since it was released. 
But i mean think about it. Popstar Lux. 
The skin model can be similar to ahri's, but maybe a different colour because Lux already has a pink skin. Her wand can be a microphone or something like that. And you know when she yells when she ults?, she could do a high note or something. 
Idk tbh just think Popstar Lux would be an amazing skin.

replies.body: personally I'm looking forward to french maid urgot more but yeah that sounds like a good skin idea. You could probably also have Popstar Janna and Ezreal since both of them have flashy ults and that showoff personality. Janna's ult could turn into like a sparkly popstar stage and Ezreal could be like a male popstar since he kinda looks like one and already has sparkles.

Definitely not a fan of the Star Guardian Lux, yours is much better.

Still waiting on that PROJECT Lux.
